code: import React from"react";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{setPitch as _setPitch}from"../../../../../../actions";import Slider from"./../../../common/RangeSlider/Slider";import"./pitch-slider.scss";var PitchSlider=function PitchSlider(props){return React.createElement("div",{className:"pitch pitch-"+props.name},React.createElement(Slider,{from:-8,to:8,onChange:props.setPitch,value:props.pitch}));};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state,ownProps){return{pitch:state.console.channel[ownProps.name].playBackState.pitch};};var mapDispachToProps=function mapDispachToProps(dispach,ownProps){return{setPitch:function setPitch(value){return dispach(_setPitch(value,ownProps.name));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispachToProps)(PitchSlider);
